languages.text: {n}Префект с некоторой тревогой смотрит на вас, затем на дознавателя.{/n} "Противоречий... не выявлено. Полагаю, младшие Моллесы вернут бразды правления семейным делом тому, кого считают отцом. Также ваше решение повлияет на делопроизводство в Администратуме: конечно, нас завалят заявками на справки о статусе "Числится живым", но это поможет выявить подложных лиц и несуществующих дворян. Заседание объявляется закрытым!"

{n}The prefect looks at you and then the Interrogator with slight alarm.{/n} "No... contradictions found. I imagine the younger Molleses are going to hand the reins of the family business back to the man whom they consider their father. Your decision is also going to affect the work of the Administratum: we can certainly expect to be swamped with requests for 'legally alive' certificates, but that will help uncover false identities and non-existent nobility. This session is now concluded!"

Также ваше решение повлияет на делопроизводство в Администратуме: конечно, нас завалят заявками на справки о статусе "Числится живым", но это поможет выявить подложных лиц и несуществующих дворян. languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin sieht leicht beunruhigt zuerst dich und dann den Interrogator an.{/n} "Keine ... Widersprüche gefunden. Ich nehme an, die jüngeren Molleses werden die Familiengeschäfte wieder an den Mann übergeben, den sie für ihren Vater halten. Eure Entscheidung wirkt sich auch auf die Arbeit des Administratums aus: Wir müssen damit rechnen, mit Anfragen nach "Lebendigkeitszertifikaten" überschwemmt zu werden, aber das wird uns helfen, falsche Identitäten und nicht-existente Adelige zu entlarven. Die Sitzung ist geschlossen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks at you and then the Interrogator with slight alarm.{/n} "No... contradictions found. I imagine the younger Molleses are going to hand the reins of the family business back to the man whom they consider their father. Ich nehme an, die jüngeren Molleses werden die Familiengeschäfte wieder an den Mann übergeben, den sie für ihren Vater halten. Eure Entscheidung wirkt sich auch auf die Arbeit des Administratums aus: Wir müssen damit rechnen, mit Anfragen nach "Lebendigkeitszertifikaten" überschwemmt zu werden, aber das wird uns helfen, falsche Identitäten und nicht-existente Adelige zu entlarven. Die Sitzung ist geschlossen!"

languages.text: {n}La préfète vous regarde tour à tour, Heinrix et vous, d'un air légèrement inquiet.{/n} « Je... ne vois aucune contradiction. J'imagine que les jeunes Molles redonneront les rênes de l'entreprise familiale à l'homme qu'ils considèrent comme leur père. Votre décision se répercutera également sur le travail de l'Administratum : nous pouvons nous attendre à être submergés de demandes de "certificats de vie", mais cela nous aidera à démasquer les usurpateurs d'identité ou ceux qui se font passer pour des nobles. Sur ce, la séance est levée ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks at you and then the Interrogator with slight alarm.{/n} "No... contradictions found. I imagine the younger Molleses are going to hand the reins of the family business back to the man whom they consider their father. Your decision is also going to affect the work of the Administratum: we can certainly expect to be swamped with requests for 'legally alive' certificates, but that will help uncover false identities and non-existent nobility. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète vous regarde tour à tour, Heinrix et vous, d'un air légèrement inquiet.{/n} « Je... ne vois aucune contradiction. J'imagine que les jeunes Molles redonneront les rênes de l'entreprise familiale à l'homme qu'ils considèrent comme leur père. Votre décision se répercutera également sur le travail de l'Administratum : nous pouvons nous attendre à être submergés de demandes de "certificats de vie", mais cela nous aidera à démasquer les usurpateurs d'identité ou ceux qui se font passer pour des nobles. Sur ce, la séance est levée ! »

languages.text: {n}行政官看了看你，又看了看海因里希，目光中带着一丝惊恐。{/n}“您的主张……没有任何矛盾之处，我相信莫莱斯家族的两位年轻人应该会把家族生意交还给他们的父亲。您的决定同样会对内政部的工作产生影响。接下来，我们恐怕会收到无数请愿，要求开具存活证明。不过，这也有助于揭露虚假身份，发现冒名顶替的贵族成员。本场审判到此结束！”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks at you and then the Interrogator with slight alarm.{/n} "No... contradictions found. I imagine the younger Molleses are going to hand the reins of the family business back to the man whom they consider their father. Your decision is also going to affect the work of the Administratum: we can certainly expect to be swamped with requests for 'legally alive' certificates, but that will help uncover false identities and non-existent nobility. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官看了看你，又看了看海因里希，目光中带着一丝惊恐。{/n}“您的主张……没有任何矛盾之处，我相信莫莱斯家族的两位年轻人应该会把家族生意交还给他们的父亲。您的决定同样会对内政部的工作产生影响。接下来，我们恐怕会收到无数请愿，要求开具存活证明。不过，这也有助于揭露虚假身份，发现冒名顶替的贵族成员。本场审判到此结束！”

languages.text: {n}La prefecta, ligeramente alarmada, os mira al interrogador y a ti.{/n} «No... hay contradicciones. Imagino que los Molles más jóvenes devolverán el negocio familiar al hombre a quien llaman padre. Desde luego, su decisión afectará drásticamente a la carga de trabajo del Administratum. Sin duda llegarán muchas peticiones para certificados de "legalmente vivo", aunque eso ayudará a descubrir identidades falsas y nobles inexistentes. ¡Se levanta la sesión!».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks at you and then the Interrogator with slight alarm.{/n} "No... contradictions found. I imagine the younger Molleses are going to hand the reins of the family business back to the man whom they consider their father. Your decision is also going to affect the work of the Administratum: we can certainly expect to be swamped with requests for 'legally alive' certificates, but that will help uncover false identities and non-existent nobility. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta, ligeramente alarmada, os mira al interrogador y a ti.{/n} «No... hay contradicciones. Imagino que los Molles más jóvenes devolverán el negocio familiar al hombre a quien llaman padre. Desde luego, su decisión afectará drásticamente a la carga de trabajo del Administratum. Sin duda llegarán muchas peticiones para certificados de "legalmente vivo", aunque eso ayudará a descubrir identidades falsas y nobles inexistentes. ¡Se levanta la sesión!».

languages.text: {n}総監は少し警戒しながら、あなたを見て、そしてインテロゲイターを見る。{/n}「矛盾は見つかりませんでした。モレス家の若者たちは、家業の手綱を自分たちの父親だと思っている人物に返そうとしているのでしょう。あなたの決断は、行政局の仕事にも影響を与えるでしょう。『法的に生きている』証明書の請求が殺到することが予想されますが、それは偽りの身分や存在しない貴族を摘発するのに役立つでしょう。本会はこれにて終了とします」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks at you and then the Interrogator with slight alarm.{/n} "No... contradictions found. I imagine the younger Molleses are going to hand the reins of the family business back to the man whom they consider their father. Your decision is also going to affect the work of the Administratum: we can certainly expect to be swamped with requests for 'legally alive' certificates, but that will help uncover false identities and non-existent nobility. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は少し警戒しながら、あなたを見て、そしてインテロゲイターを見る。{/n}「矛盾は見つかりませんでした。モレス家の若者たちは、家業の手綱を自分たちの父親だと思っている人物に返そうとしているのでしょう。あなたの決断は、行政局の仕事にも影響を与えるでしょう。『法的に生きている』証明書の請求が殺到することが予想されますが、それは偽りの身分や存在しない貴族を摘発するのに役立つでしょう。本会はこれにて終了とします」

languages.text: {n}Hafif telaşa kapılan Prefekt, sırayla sana ve Sorgucu'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Hiçbir... İtiraz yok. Tahminimce Molles çocukları, aile işletmelerinin dizginlerini babaları olarak gördükleri adama iade edecektir. Kararınız, Administratum'un çalışmalarını da etkileyecektir. Üzerinde 'yasal olarak hayatta' yazan belgeler için talep yağmuruna tutulacağımız kesin ancak bu da sahte kimlikleri ve hiç var olmamış soyluları ortaya çıkarmaya yardımcı olacaktır. Oturum sona ermiştir!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect looks at you and then the Interrogator with slight alarm.{/n} "No... contradictions found. I imagine the younger Molleses are going to hand the reins of the family business back to the man whom they consider their father. Your decision is also going to affect the work of the Administratum: we can certainly expect to be swamped with requests for 'legally alive' certificates, but that will help uncover false identities and non-existent nobility. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt hafif bir telaşla önce sana sonra Sorgucu'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Hiçbir... İtiraz yok. Tahminimce genç Mollesler, aile işletmelerinin dizginlerini babaları olarak gördükleri adama iade edeceklerdir. Kararınız Administratum'un çalışmalarını da etkileyecektir. Üzerinde 'yasal olarak hayatta' yazan belgeler için talep yağmuruna tutulacağımız kesin ancak bu sahte kimlikleri ve hiç var olmamış soyluları ortaya çıkarmaya yardımcı olacaktır. Oturum sona ermiştir!"
